name: Balloon Party (Sam McCreery)
description:
In Balloon Party (2021) you play a kids' party clown named Buddy. The kids are restless and want balloon animals NOW! Make as many balloon animals as you can within the time limit, but make sure you give the kids what they ask for!

This game and all its assets were made in 3 hours as part of Bean Jam 15.

Controls
WASD - Move
1234 - Make balloon
